meanings.sent1: She always presettles her schedule for the week on Sunday evenings.
meanings.sent2: The team presettles the meeting time to avoid any conflicts.
meanings.sent3: The cat presettles itself on the couch before anyone else can sit down.
meanings.sent4: The sun presettles behind the mountains, casting a warm glow over the valley.
meanings.sent5: The idea of going on a vacation presettles in her mind, bringing excitement.

meanings.definition: To decide or arrange in advance.
meanings.sent1: He presettles the menu for the party to make sure everyone's dietary needs are met.
meanings.sent2: The students presettle their study groups before the semester starts.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel presettles its route to gather nuts efficiently.
meanings.sent4: The melody presettles in her mind, ready to be composed into a beautiful song.
meanings.sent5: The plan to renovate the house presettles in their discussions, bringing excitement and anticipation.
